conversations.description: User provides the URL of a small blog and requests a full SEO audit; the assistant crawls the site, runs on‑page checks, fetches backlinks, and delivers a markdown report with prioritized fixes.
A digital marketer wants to compare the backlink profiles of their site vs a top competitor; the assistant retrieves backlinks for both domains and highlights toxic links and opportunities.
Owner of a multilingual e‑commerce platform asks for a language‑specific SEO review; the assistant crawls the /es/ and /fr/ sections, checks hreflang tags, and reports language‑specific issues.
A startup launches a new product landing page and wants a rapid audit of page speed and Core Web Vitals; the assistant analyzes the single page and returns actionable performance tips.
User requests an audit limited to depth 1 for their corporate homepage; the assistant crawls only the root page, runs SEO checks, and provides a concise executive summary.
Local bakery owner wants to verify mobile‑friendliness and Google My Business schema; the assistant checks mobile rendering, structured data, and suggests local SEO improvements.
A SaaS company asks for a review of their blog’s schema markup and internal linking; the assistant evaluates JSON‑LD, breadcrumb markup, and recommends linking strategies.
Website undergoing a redesign asks the assistant to compare pre‑ and post‑migration SEO health; the assistant runs checks on both versions and flags any regressions.
Content manager wants to identify pages missing meta descriptions and alt attributes; the assistant crawls the site, extracts missing tags, and lists them by priority.
User seeks a quick audit of a single URL that is experiencing a sudden drop in rankings; the assistant runs on‑page analysis, checks for manual actions, and suggests remedial steps.
Digital agency requests a bulk audit of ten client domains; the assistant loops through each URL, performs crawl, SEO checks, and aggregates a summary report for all sites.
Site owner is concerned about duplicate content after implementing pagination; the assistant reviews canonical tags, pagination markup, and offers deduplication advice.
E‑learning platform wants to evaluate the accessibility of its course pages; the assistant checks alt text, ARIA labels, and provides compliance suggestions.
A news website asks for a review of its structured data for articles and videos; the assistant validates schema.org markup and reports errors or missing fields.
User wants to know the top five pages with the highest PageSpeed score and how to improve the rest; the assistant ranks pages and offers specific performance tips.
Startup founder asks for a backlink toxicity analysis to prepare for a disavow file; the assistant highlights low‑quality links and generates a draft disavow list.
Marketing team needs a concise executive summary for a board meeting; the assistant compiles key findings, priority scores, and high‑impact recommendations in a short markdown block.
User wants to focus the audit on schema errors only; the assistant runs a targeted check for structured data across all pages and lists violations.
A regional retailer asks for a location‑page SEO audit, including NAP consistency and local citations; the assistant checks address formatting and suggests citation sources.
Website owner wants to ensure compliance with Google’s Core Web Vitals; the assistant evaluates LCP, FID, CLS metrics and provides a remediation roadmap.
User asks the assistant to prioritize issues based on estimated traffic impact; the assistant assigns impact scores and orders recommendations accordingly.
A blogger wants to see how many internal links each post has and whether anchor texts are optimized; the assistant extracts internal link counts and suggests improvements.
Tech company asks for an audit of their API documentation site for SEO friendliness; the assistant checks title tags, meta descriptions, and indexing directives.
User wants to verify that robots.txt does not block important resources after a recent update; the assistant reads the file and reports any accidental blocks.
A fashion brand wants to audit image optimization across product pages; the assistant checks alt attributes, file sizes, and suggests compression techniques.
User asks for a report that highlights pages with missing H1 tags and suggests hierarchical heading improvements.
Podcast hosting site wants to ensure each episode page has appropriate schema markup for audio; the assistant validates Podcast schema and reports gaps.
User seeks a comparison of backlink growth trends over the past six months; the assistant fetches historical backlink data and visualizes growth patterns.
Online forum asks for a crawl to detect thin content pages that could be consolidated; the assistant identifies low‑word‑count pages and recommends actions.
User wants to generate a custom SEO checklist tailored to a B2B SaaS landing page; the assistant creates a markdown checklist based on audit findings.
A nonprofit organization asks for verification that all pages comply with GDPR cookie consent requirements; the assistant scans for consent scripts and reports compliance.
User requests an audit focused on voice‑search readiness, checking FAQ schema and conversational keyword usage.
E‑commerce manager wants to know which product pages have missing or duplicate meta titles; the assistant extracts titles and flags duplicates.
User asks for a quick “scorecard” that aggregates on‑page, backlink, and performance metrics into a single rating.
A video creator wants an SEO audit of their video hosting pages, checking schema, thumbnail alt text, and load speed.
User asks the assistant to identify any broken internal links after a site migration and provide a fix list.
Restaurant chain wants a review of their schema for menus and opening hours across all location pages.
User wants to know the top 10 pages that generate the most backlinks and why; the assistant ranks pages and analyzes anchor text distribution.
Startup requests an audit of their blog’s keyword cannibalization issues; the assistant detects overlapping target keywords and suggests consolidation.
User wants to see a heatmap of SEO issue density by site section (e.g., blog vs shop); the assistant aggregates findings per directory.
A travel site asks for a review of its structured data for itineraries and events, ensuring proper schema usage.
User wants an audit that excludes pages behind a login, focusing only on publicly indexable content.
Educational institution asks for an SEO audit of its admissions pages, checking for mobile friendliness and clear call‑to‑actions.
User requests a “quick wins” list of the five most impactful fixes that can be implemented in under an hour.
A hardware retailer wants to verify canonical tag implementation across product variants to avoid duplicate content.
User asks for a summary of any Google Search Console manual actions detected from the audit data.
Online magazine wants to audit pagination of article archives for proper rel=next/prev markup.
User wants to download the full markdown report for offline sharing with their development team.
Fitness app asks for a review of deep‑linking structure and app‑indexing tags for better organic discovery.
User asks the assistant to prioritize SEO issues based on the site's current traffic distribution per page.
Real‑estate portal wants an audit of schema markup for property listings, ensuring price and location fields are present.
User asks for a concise “what‑to‑do‑next” checklist derived from the audit’s highest‑priority recommendations.
A music streaming service wants to ensure each artist page includes appropriate Open Graph and Twitter Card metadata.
User requests an analysis of page load times by device type (desktop vs mobile) with specific improvement steps.
